p: DEN and 6-gingerol were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich Chemicals Company (St. Louis, MO, USA). Assay kits including ELISA kits for inflammatory markers, antioxidant enzymes, and antibody TNF-alpha were purchased from Abcam, United Kingdom. The organic solvents (methanol, acetone, and ethanol), potassium dihydrogen phosphate (KH 2PO 4), ethylenediaminetetraacetic acid (EDTA), and hydrogen peroxide were of analytical grade.
